amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, $5,000,000 to support Shortstop Electronic Protection Systems research and development efforts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1302 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1302 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9566-9569; text: CR S9566) To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, $5,000,000 to support Shortstop Electronic Protection Systems research and development efforts.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1302 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1302 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
